member.name: T:Raven.Client.Embedded.EmbeddableDocumentStore
member.summary: Manages access to RavenDB and open sessions to work with RavenDB. Also supports hosting RavenDB in an embedded mode

member.summary: Get or set the configuration instance for embedded RavenDB

member.summary: Run RavenDB in an embedded mode, using in memory only storage. This is useful for unit tests, since it is very fast.

member.summary: Run RavenDB in embedded mode, using the specified directory for data storage

member.summary: Access the embedded instance of RavenDB
